Class AbstractReactiveWebServerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.web.server.AbstractConfigurableWebServerFactory
org.springframework.boot.web.server.reactive.AbstractReactiveWebServerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorPageRegistry, ConfigurableWebServerFactory, ConfigurableReactiveWebServerFactory, ReactiveWebServerFactory, WebServerFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
NettyReactiveWebServerFactory
public abstract class AbstractReactiveWebServerFactory extends AbstractConfigurableWebServerFactory implements ConfigurableReactiveWebServerFactory
Abstract base class for ReactiveWebServerFactory implementations.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Brian Clozel
